pr_title: BLUEBUTTON-1864: Medicare Opt Out bucket fixes, AB2D onboarding

timeline.message: DenyNonExplicit does not work properly, fix KMS policy, remove offboarded user
Add AB2D roles that need read access to prod-sbx bucket

timeline.bodyText: Does AB2D run on different accounts?
timeline.author: RickHawesUSDS

replies.bodyText: @RickHawesUSDS They are using the new cloudtamer setup which dictates one account per environment, so yes.
replies.author: njdister
